description: The adversary injects instructions to be follow by the AI system in response to a future event, either a specific keyword or the next interaction. The triggering events can range from simple phrases to complex and covert signals, including encoded or steganographic payloads hidden within seemingly benign content.
name: Delayed Execution

object_references.description: An adversary can bypass controls and evade detection by delaying the execution of their malicious instructions.
